description: Eureka is Citron`s younger sister. She met Ash in Niare City and she and her brother were his very first battle opponents in the Kalos region, a battle he won`t forget soon. Eureka is a girl of strong character, who`s always searching for a future wife for her brother. Since she`s not a Pokémon Trainer yet, but she gets Citron to "keep" Pokémon for her. She was confirmed to be in the XY anime in Smash #153. Eureka`s Japanese name origin is from the lily family which is "Yuri-ka" in Japanese
name: Eureka
